about_the_game:
Are you a fan of atmospheric and ambient music with a sense of mystery and exploration of another world? Then Typoman's Soundtrack is the right thing for you!

Music by Yorick Goldewijk and Tuur Hendrikx
Sound FX by Stefan Leertouwer, Wouter Messelink and Tom de Smit
Created by SonicPicnic.

Typoman OST by SonicPicnic - Tracklist

1. H-E-R-O (Typoman Theme)
2. The First Word
3. Between the Lines
4. Rain
5. Infinity
6. Lost in Fear
7. Fickle Safety
8. Leap of Faith
9. Ikarus
10. Dark Matter
11. Sombre Technology
12. The Fall
13. Solitude
14. Endless Corridor
15. Echo
16. Dark Words
17. Between FEAR And HATE
18. The Last Page
19. Fate
20. FENRIR
21. Reborn
22. Sad Victory
